IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 14:22 IST
 Indian Institute of Technology
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Jammu and Kashmir |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Institute of Technology Jammu (IIT Jammu) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.Sc. can apply for the IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025. The interested candidates can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Jammu & Kashmir.

IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Research Fellow	01	M.Sc

IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 28 Years.
Age relaxation for reserved candidates: 05 Years.

IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 37,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	07-08-2025
Closing date	22-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
